casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Charles WALKER. No. 76A95-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 2, 2004. Paul M. Green, Durham, Jonathan L. Megerian, Asheboro, for Charles Walker. R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th day of November 2004 by Attorney General to Vacate Stay of Execution Entered by Superior Court of Guilford County:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of December 2004."
